question: You play a team sport with some friends. Last week a member of the team had an accident and wasn’t able to play with you at the weekend. You decide to write to him in hospital, telling him about the match.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter,tell him which team wondescribe the conditions on the daysay how you felt about the match
text: Hope this letter finds you well and I am writing this letter with mixed emotions as you are recovering well sooner than expected which is really great to hear. However, we decided to play the last match without and finally we had a nail-biting match with trumpet victory.

As you know, upsides and downsides in our team and we struggled a lot all the way to come out of a critical situation despite team members back to back injuries. Therefore,  at the end of the match, we  got a mesmerizing goal which put us into first place on the board.

I felt this was one of the best matches I played ever in my life. In addition, team member support and mindblowing performance with spectacular goals are really eye feasts to the entire stadium and crowded too. Last but not least I missed your company during the match which I did not even think about in my dreams.
I hope you will come out of  bed very soon and we will have a nice match again with our all team members.
Cannot wait anymore to play the game with you and take care.
